snippet: Police said they had arrested a suspect they believe set at least a dozen fires within a week in San Jose. William P. Brennan, 48, of San Jose, was charged with two counts of arson, and additional charges are likely, Assistant Chief Eddie Garcia...
abstract: Police in San Jose, Calif, say they have arrested William P Brennan, who they believe set at least a dozen fires within a week, and have charged him with two counts of arson with additional charges likely to follow.
lead_paragraph: Police said they had arrested a suspect they believe set at least a dozen fires within a week in San Jose. William P. Brennan, 48, of San Jose, was charged with two counts of arson, and additional charges are likely, Assistant Chief Eddie Garcia said.
